General.Name: Madoro Metals Corp
General.Description: Madoro Metals Corp., a precious metals company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Mexico. It primarily explores for gold and silver. The company holds options to acquire 100% interests in Yautepec project covering 12,260 hectares; Magdalena project covering 480 hectares; and Rama de Oro project covering 1,940 hectares near Oaxaca city, Mexico. It also holds an option agreement to acquire 100% of the First Green Lithium project covering 12,325 hectares located in Quebec, Canada. The company was formerly known as Megastar Development Corp. and changed its name to Madoro Metals Corp. in March 2021. Madoro Metals Corp. was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
